bladdr 1.0.0
  • Reference

    Function reference

    Exploratory Data Analysis

    Functions for rapid data exploration.

    eda_heatmap()
    Make a heatmap of a select number of genes

    I/O

    Functions for file acquisition

    get_gbci() get_gbci_file() get_gbci_dir()
    Get a directory or file from the GBCI SharePoint
    get_pcr()
    Get from a raw data folder
    list_pcr() list_nanodrop() list_chemidoc() list_licor() list_evos() list_qubit() list_spectramax()
    List from a raw data folder

    MTT

    Functions for analyzing MTTs

    mtt
    Example data from an MTT
    mtt_calc()
    Calculate and fit MTT model from absorbance data
    mtt_model()
    Try to fit a logistic curve to MTT data
    mtt_plot()
    Plot MTT results
    get_ic()
    Get the IC value of a fit at a given percent

    Utilities

    Misc. quality of life functions.

    get_gene_expression()
    Get expression of gene by indices in a dds
    dummy_rna_conc
    Example data of RNA samples with concentrations
    add_project()
    Add a new targets 'project'
    dilute()
    Calculate dilution from known concentrations
    make_pipette_vol()
    Round volume to be pipette-compatible
    theme_tufte()
    ggplot theme in the style of Edward Tufte
    evos_flatten()
    Flatten an EVOS timelapse directory
